column16: [nodes]) | rename a label from 'oldLabel' to 'newLabel' for all nodes. If 'nodes' is provided renaming is applied to this set only

column18: {config}) | rename all node's property from 'oldName' to 'newName'. If 'nodes' is provided renaming is applied to this set only
{config}) | rename all relationships with type 'oldType' to 'newType'. If 'rels' is provided renaming is applied to this set only
{config}) | rename all relationship's property from 'oldName' to 'newName'. If 'rels' is provided renaming is applied to this set only
